description: Monitor BGP and Interfaces and system details using SNMP

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_BGP" with KEY = "bgpPeerRemoteAddr"
list.name: bgpPeerRemoteAddr

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interfaces_statistics" with KEY = "ifName"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_snmp" with KEY = "hostname"
